snippet.title: Qld police hunt missing, injured man
snippet.content: A missing man is believed to be seriously injured after police found blood at a property following a disturbance in north Queensland. Residents in Townsville's Railway Estate called police about 10.30pm on Sunday after hearing yelling coming from an apartment. Three men are being interviewed and police are urging a fourth man with possible severe injuries to come forward to get medical help. Originally published as
